Class GameController

java.lang.Object
logic.game.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The central "God Object" or Facade that orchestrates the entire game state.

Responsibilities: 1. Game Loop: Manages the main thread that updates game logic. 2. Entity Management: Holds the list of all active game objects. 3. Concurrency Safety: Bridges the gap between the Logic Thread and the JavaFX UI Thread.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Kicks off the main game logic thread. This runs separately from the JavaFX Application Thread to prevent UI freezing during heavy calculations.

    • update

      public void update()
      The heartbeat of the game. Called every frame (~16ms).

    • buyTower

      public boolean buyTower(int x, int y, String towerType)
      Attempts to purchase and place a tower. Validates money and map constraints before using TowerManager.
